title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1447/95 of 26 June 1995 repealing Regulation (EEC) No 3944/87 and Regulation (EEC) No 209/88 in the pigmeat sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1447/95 of 26 June 1995 repealing Regulation (EEC) No 3944/87 and Regulation (EEC) No 209/88 in the pigmeat sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 June 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 282, 1. 11. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 349, 31. 12. 1994, p. 105.
(3) OJ No L 373, 31. 12. 1987, p. 25.
(4) OJ No L 204, 27. 7. 1991, p. 21.
(5) OJ No L 21, 27. 1. 1988, p. 5.
(6) OJ No L 387, 31. 12. 1992, p. 24.
